summary: During the Civil War, ex-parson Josiah Galt and his sons are Confederate raiders but they become common robbers after the war, save for son David who goes straight.
cast: Vince Edwards|Sylvia Syms|Benjamin Edney|Jack Palance|Sheila Burrell|George Maharis|Kate O'Mara|Christian Roberts|Kenneth Cope|Patrick Holt|Christopher Malcolm|John Clark|Neville Brand|John Paul|David Thomson|Elliott Sullivan|Ed Bishop|Robert Rietty|Agustín Bescos
title: La marca de Caín
